Package FOMS.menu_manager

Class MenuItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • FOMS.menu_manager.MenuItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Burger, Drink, SetMeal, Side
    public class MenuItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a menu item. Each menu item has a name, cost, branch, customizations, availability, and description. Customizations are represented as a string containing additional details or modifications to the item.
    Since:
    2024-04-24
